Articles.Content:
The ksp add-on for blender does not seem to recognize the new parts added in 1.0.5.

Is anyone else having this problem?

The ksp add-on for blender does not seem to recognize the new parts added in 1.0.5.

Is anyone else having this problem?

They are made with a new version of PartTools, as far as I know.

Hard to tell what exactly has changed, but that could be causing this problem.

They are made with a new version of PartTools, as far as I know.

Hard to tell what exactly has changed, but that could be causing this problem.

Well, thanks.

Seems that I need to wait for an update.
Were the part tools released somewhere?
Not yet. The Part tools thread in Add-on Development is where it will be released eventually.
